item.title: GetDockerized: An Initiative to Learn Docker as Deep as Possible, Once Again
item.description: Docker is one of the most wonderful tool for development scenario. It is very important now a days. I did have knowledge in this, but that seems scattered knowledge. Thus, I wanted to learn it as through as possible and share it here and in github with a repo name of GetDockerized: https://github.com/fahadahammed/GetDockerizedHope to learn a lot and will be able to focus properly.
